about_the_game: Set on the desolate surface of the moon, this intense game pits a team of engineers and scientists against a deadly tentacled alien in disguise. Players must work together to repair the damaged moon base while secretly trying to identify the alien, who is sabotaging their efforts and hunting them down. When suspicion arises, any player can call for a meeting, and the crew must vote to accuse and disintegrate someone. If the crew successfully eliminates the alien, they win. But if they make the wrong choice, the alien will have a chance to destroy the moon base and devour the entire crew. Can you survive the moon's isolation and the alien threat, or will you be the next to fall?

content_descriptors.notes: One player is tasked with killing the other players with deadly weapons that will cut off parts and cause other players to explode. There is blood.

detailed_description: Set on the desolate surface of the moon, this intense game pits a team of engineers and scientists against a deadly tentacled alien in disguise. Players must work together to repair the damaged moon base while secretly trying to identify the alien, who is sabotaging their efforts and hunting them down. When suspicion arises, any player can call for a meeting, and the crew must vote to accuse and disintegrate someone. If the crew successfully eliminates the alien, they win. But if they make the wrong choice, the alien will have a chance to destroy the moon base and devour the entire crew. Can you survive the moon's isolation and the alien threat, or will you be the next to fall?
name: Compulsory

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 and above
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 GB available space

short_description: On the moon, players race to repair the base while one disguised alien secretly sabotages and hunts them. Players call meetings to vote on who they think the alien is. If they disintegrate the alien, the crew wins. But a wrong vote gives the alien a chance to destroy the base and kill everyone.
